Package frogger.util

Class WorldLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.util.WorldLoader
  • public class WorldLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The WorldLoader is a utility to load the PreloadedActor according to the game mode and level.
    See Also:
    PreloadedActor, Game(GameController, GameMode, GameLevel, Pane)

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorldLoader

        public WorldLoader​(GameMode gameMode,
                   GameLevel gameLevel,
                   javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
        Constructs a new WorldLoader with the specified parameters.

        The method will first read the actor, then reset them, finally draw them on the pane.

        Parameters:
        gameMode - the mode of the game
        gameLevel - the level of the game
        root - the pane need to be drawn

    • Method Detail

      • readActor

        private void readActor()
        Reads actors from PreloadedActor

      • resetActor

        private void resetActor()
        Resets actors.

        e.g. reset automatic actors to initial position reset the score, life... of the frog to initial value
